scripts.buildfront: cargo run-script libwasm && pnpm -C ./app/nextgraph install && pnpm -C ./app/nextgraph webbuild && pnpm -C ./engine/broker/auth install && pnpm -C ./engine/broker/auth build
scripts.buildfrontdev: pnpm -C ./engine/broker/auth builddev && pnpm -C ./infra/ngnet/bootstrap builddev && pnpm -C ./infra/ngnet/auth builddev && pnpm -C ./infra/ngnet/redir builddev
